price: Mengapa kami tidak akan beriman kepada Allah dan kepada kebenaran yang datang kepada kami? Padahal kami sangat ingin agar Tuhan kami memasukkan kami ke dalam golongan orang-orang yang saleh?"
arabic: وَمَا لَنَا لَا نُؤۡمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ وَمَا جَآءَنَا مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَنَطۡمَعُ أَن يُدۡخِلَنَا رَبُّنَا مَعَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā lanā lā nu'minu bil-lahi wamā jāanā mina al-ḥaqi wanaṭmaʿu an yud'khilanā rabbunā maʿa al-qawmi al-ṣāliḥīna
